text:
Students, 'Fit Hai to Hit Hai India' webinar will now be held on 🗓️3rd July at 🕔5 PM.
If you have not shared your queries yet, you still have a chance. Ask your fitness-related questions now in the comments below using #FitIndiaTalks and get answers directly from our panelists. https://t.co/3ElXD6kMXM
